summary: different sets of light armor with different attributes .
descriptionHtml:
[color=#f9cb9c][size=3][color=#f4cccc]
[/color][/size][/color]






                                                                [size=4]                   [/size][color=#b4a7d6][size=3][size=4][color=#f4f4f4]With[/color] [color=#ff00ff]purple[/color] [color=#f4f4f4]to[/color] [color=#351C75]violet [/color]

                                                         from the beginnings to the end

                                                                  [i]she walks in beauty[/i][/size]




          Go for adventure to build your beloved sets , search for ingredients , harvest monsters , explore dungeons and buy some strange stuff ... you never know what you'll need .


          Are you playing as a thief ? , a mage ? , not any of these two ? , you like powerful stuff ? , you dont ? , you like the sets to be already enchanted when you craft them ? , you are a skyre user ? no ? ... eight different versions of five sets of beautifully colored light armor (body hand feet) are included in the download to suit the  playing style you prefer . this is a remake of the yurica's mod "kisetsu kimono for unp" the meshes and textures are still needed from the original mod , everything else is changed . 



           loved the sets from yurica's mod kisetsu kimono ... i tweaked them while following a particular approach to do that , wanted these armors to accompany me while leveling and to remain useful at high levels while having to do a lot of adventuring to be able to craft them ...

           how did i tweak the sets ? , well [b][color=#f4f4f4]first[/color][/b] i changed the armor values for the various sets and made every set different from the others in those values , the sets where named haru natsu aki fuyu and violet , i left the names and the colors as they were but gave some more meaning to the order of the sequence , so now the first set "haru" has an armor value similar to the leather set but more powerful , its like a first tier in the sequence , the "aki" one is like a second tier with the different color and more armor ratings its a bit more powerful then the elven one , the "natsu" represents the third tier it falls into the advanced armors category with a new color and more armor ratings , the fuyu is the fourth tier and belongs to the glass category in ratings but also more powerful then the glass set , the violet set is the ultimate tier more powerful then the dragonscale one .

          they are more powerful then their respective categories but they are much more difficult to craft and temper , as i changed [color=#f4f4f4][b]secondly[/b][/color] the respective recipes for crafting and tempering , this way you'll need to do much more adventuring and maybe some shopping to get the materials to be able to craft them , each set now have its own different recipe to suit its category .

[color=#f4f4f4][b]          third[/b][/color] i made the sets to be crafted at the forge as they now needs some materials that i didnt see fit anymore for the tanning rack .

          [color=#f4f4f4][b]fourth [/b][/color]i added a new req. for all the sets after "haru" the first one in the sequence which doesint have one , to craft "natsu" you now need the elven perk (smithing tree) , to craft the "aki" you need the advanced armor perk , to craft the "fuyu" you need the glass perk , and to craft the "violet" you need the dragon one , why did i add these req. ? , well because i believe that it doesint make any sense and that its game breaking that you can craft a set more powerful then the glass set or the dragonscale one from the game beginnings ... progression of abilities and adventure .

          [color=#f4f4f4][b]fifth[/b][/color] i tweaked some of the sets (see description below) so they come now already enchanted when you craft them , and that in different styles to suit the different ways of playing the game (you can use the unenchanted versions if you dont like that or use a tool to disenchant the ones you like their enchantments to be changed) . 

         [color=#f4f4f4][b] six[/b][/color] i added the various versions in two groups for different play styles .

          all sets are to be crafted at the forge under miscellaneous , the ones that req. a perk will appear there only after you buy  the needed perk , they are all temperable .


          the crafting as i said above is much more difficult then in the original esp , that to compensate the higher armor rating values ... , and to give more purpose to adventuring , the whole work is to allow you to enjoy those beautiful sets at any level , feel a sense of progression with the different colors and to have some more competitive and lovely sets at high levels . well its a bit like a color/resistense/power/progression journey that begins with the spring purple ... to reach the ultimate violet after the winter white , i like it .

          some of the already added enchantments will give some of the low level armor rating pieces a new purpose and that to make them still useful after advancing in the game , the various enchantments are not overpowered but interesting so you'll find useful to combine some lower pieces with some higher ones for different purposes ...

          as i said above eight versions are included in the download , you only need one , they are in two groups (readme included in the download) .


the first group (normal) includes four version :

1- base normal version (no enchantments)
2- normal general oriented enchantments where the various pieces comes already enchanted in a way to suit a non specialized way of playing .
3- normal generally thief oriented enchantments (for thieves)
4- normal generally mage oriented enchantments (for mages)


armor ratings normal sets :


the purple "Haru" set , no perk needed .
body  29
hands 9
feet  9

the red "Aki" set , needs the elven perk .
body  33
hands 10
feet  10
 
the yellow "Natsu" set , needs the advanced armor perk .
body  37
hands 12
feet  12
 
the white "Fuyu" set , needs the glass perk .
body  45
hands 15
feet  15

the "Violet" set , needs the dragoncraft perk .
body  50
hands 18
feet  18


second group (high) includes another four versions :

higher armor ratings .

1- base high version (no enchantments)
2- high general oriented enchantments where the various pieces comes already enchanted in a way to suit a non specialized way of playing .
3- high generally thief oriented enchantments(for thieves)
4- high generally mage oriented enchantments (for mages)


     the high versions all have the same armor ratings , their armor ratings are already set to be fit for use with skyre (where the armor ratings are much higher then vanilla) but still more powerful ... , you can use them in vanilla game if you like to have some powerful stuff or after enough leveling or if you are using a lot of difficulty enhancers in your game (skyre and the reprocer are not requiered) .

note 1 : IMPORTANT for skyre users : do not include the sets in the reprocer (the armor ratings are already set to be fit for skyre) .
note 2 : they can be used with vanilla with no problem .

armor ratings high sets :

the purple "Haru" set , no perk needed to craft .
body   65
hands  24
feet    24

the red "Aki" set , needs the elven perk .
body   80
hands  28
feet    28
 
the yellow "Natsu" set , needs the advanced armor perk .
body   92
hands  33
feet    33

the white "Fuyu" set , needs the glass perk .
body   120
hands  40
feet    40

the "Violet" set , needs the dragoncraft perk .
body   132
hands  45
feet    45

     
hope you enjoy it , if you do dont forget to endorse it and endorse the original one by yurica .
      

credits :

many thanks to yurica for giving me permission to upload this mod , without her delightful creations this mod would not be possible . 

Requirements :

skyrim last version .
UNP Base body .
the meshes and texture files from yurica's mod Kisetsu Kimono for unp .

Installations :

1 - install yurica's mod kisetsu kimono for unp .
2 - replace yurica's esp (yurica_kimono.esp) with the one of your liking from this mod .
3 - Activate the esp .

unintallation :

remove the meshes textures and the esp from your data folder .[/size][/color]
author: terso
